subject: Football
Television
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Cablevision agreed to carry the NFL Network’s coverage of the Texas Bowl on Thursday between Rutgers and Kansas State to its 3.1 million subscribers in the New York-New Jersey area.
snippet: Cablevision agreed to carry the NFL Network’s coverage of the Texas Bowl on Thursday between Rutgers and Kansas State to its 3.1 million subscribers in the New York-New Jersey area.
